thread.title: Fawad Khan opens up on being bullied in school
thread.title_full: Fawad Khan opens up on being bullied in school - Entertainment

author: ANI
title: Fawad Khan opens up on being bullied in school
text:
Karachi: Fawad Khan has recently revealed that he was bullied during his school days.
The 33-year-old actor said in a recent interview that he was picked on and bullied in school, but now he looks at it in a funny way as he studied in an American school and the idea of brown and white didn't mix well there, reports the Express tribune.

Fawad Khan. File pic/Datta Kumbhar 
The 'Khoobsurat' star further added he was bullied because of his athletic built and also because he was the quiet one and didn't like arguments.
Fawad will be next seen in 'Kapoor and Sons' that also stars Sidharth Malhotra.
